    public abstract class MapsActivity
extends androidx.fragment.app.FragmentActivity
implements com.google.android.gms.maps.OnMapReadyCallback, com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap.OnMapClickListener
    Google Maps Activity Author : Henry Lin Creates a google map fragment where markers can be placed
    See Also:
    Location, Modified source from: https://developers.google.com/maps/documentation/android-sdk/start Under the Apache 2.0 license

      • onCreate

        protected void onCreate(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
        Overrides:
        onCreate in class androidx.fragment.app.FragmentActivity

      • onMapReady

        public void onMapReady(com.google.android.gms.maps.GoogleMap googleMap)
        Manipulates the map once available. This callback is triggered when the map is ready to be used. This is where we can add markers or lines, add listeners or move the camera. If Google Play services is not installed on the device, the user will be prompted to install it inside the SupportMapFragment. This method will only be triggered once the user has installed Google Play services and returned to the app.
        Specified by:
        onMapReady in interface com.google.android.gms.maps.OnMapReadyCallback

        public void onRequestPermissionsResult(int requestCode,
